Player History
Injured on 4/15/1966 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 4/3/1967 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/3/1968, off Jim Lonborg (CHC)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/26/1968, off Lindy McDaniel (PIT)...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago (N) on 4/26/1969...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1969, hitting .455 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Los Angeles on 6/20/1970...
Injured on 7/21/1973 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Was selected to the 1975 Allstar game...
Traded from Cincinnati to San Francisco on 7/31/1975 (Going to SF: 3B B. Robertson. Going to CIN: CF M. Anderson)...
Won MVP Award in 1975, hitting .276 with 43 HR, 108 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Houston on 9/25/1976...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/29/1976, hitting .500 with 4 HR, 11 RBI...
Was selected to the 1977 Allstar game...
Traded from San Francisco to Minnesota on 7/14/1977 (Going to SF: P D. Lewallyn, P M. Fidrych, SS R. Washington, LF L. Fritz, LF M. Rivers. Going to MIN: 1B B. Robertson)...
Won World Series with Minnesota in 1977...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1978, hitting .356 with 8 HR, 22 RBI...
Won World Series with Minnesota in 1978...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Detroit on 5/23/1979...
Injured on 7/27/1980 with a Strained Achilles Tendon, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by New York (A) on 2/4/1981 to a 3-year deal worth $7,000,000 per year...
